name: Snap! (Declan Smyth)
description:
What do you do when your breaks snap on a highway?!
Play an exciting game promoting road safety week in Australia!

Make sure you check out the Road Safety Website:
https://roadsafetyweek.com.au/

and MAKE THE PLEDGE 
https://roadsafetyweek.com.au/pledged

The UI art was done by the lovely Skye Lavelle :)
Her Socials:
https://www.instagram.com/_.mayushii._/
https://www.behance.net/skyelavelle
https://twitter.com/LavelleSkye 

Controls:
Move Left: 'A' or Left Arrow Key
Move Right: 'D' or Right Arrow Key
Open Pause Menu: 'Esc'

Made this in about 4-5 days soooo just keep that in mind when you find weird physics bugs n' such ;P
